availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Timothy Patrick Andrews (Union Army, paymaster general)

body.p: Baltimore, Maryland, soldier. Native of Ireland. Married to Emily R. Andrews. Father of Richard S. Andrews, Ann Louisa Andrews, Emily R. Andrews, Caroline E. Andrews, and Albert L. Andrews. Served in the United States Army from 1812 to 1864. Served in the U.S. Army as deputy paymaster general with the rank of lieutenant colonel from December 17, 1851 to September 6, 1862, and as paymaster general, with the rank of colonel, until November 20, 1864.
